label: Visual Studio Premium 2013 MDA Win 8.1 Ent N (x64)
displayName: Visual Studio Premium 2013 with Multi-Device Hybrid Apps on Windows 8.1 Enterprise N (x64)
description: This image, available exclusively to MSDN subscribers, contains Windows 8.1 Enterprise N x64, Visual Studio 2013 Premium Update 3, and CTP 2.0 of the Extension for Multi-Device Hybrid App Development. It allows you to easily and quickly set up a development environment in Azure to build and test Android, iOS, and Windows apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. For more information on Windows 8.1 N edition see here.
